Sentencas: Apatite-type systems have been attracting significant attention recently due to their high oxide ion conductivity, offering the potential for use as the electrolyte in a solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC).
Titulo: Oxide ion conductivity in mixed Si/Ge-based apatite-type systems

Sentencas: In this article, we report the synthesis and conductivities of a range of novel mixed Si/ Ge-based apatite systems, La8.67BaSi6-yGeyO26 and La9.33Si6-yGeyO26 (0less than or equal toyless than or equal to6).
Titulo: Oxide ion conductivity in mixed Si/Ge-based apatite-type systems

Sentencas: The results suggest that problems due to Ge volatility increase with increasing Ge content, but are partially reduced by Ba doping, which helps to stabilise the hexagonal apatite lattice.
Titulo: Oxide ion conductivity in mixed Si/Ge-based apatite-type systems

Sentencas: All the phases show high oxide ion conductivities, although the activation energy for oxide ion conduction shows a general increase with increasing Ge content.
Titulo: Oxide ion conductivity in mixed Si/Ge-based apatite-type systems

Sentencas: The mixed systems show the highest conductivities (e.g., sigma(800) (c)=0.06 S cm(-1) for La9.33Si2Ge4O26), and so are promising materials as electrolytes for SOFCs if problems due to Ge loss can be overcome.
Titulo: Oxide ion conductivity in mixed Si/Ge-based apatite-type systems
